item.title: FPIs withdraw  ₹12,257 crore in first week of September — why are foreign investors exiting?

review.headline_rewrite: FPIs withdraw  ₹12,257 crore in first week of September — why are foreign investors exiting?
bullets: According to the Associate Director & Manager Research of Morningstar Investment, Himanshu Srivastava, quoted by PTI, a combination of global and domestic factors contributed
However, the impact was cushioned by the government’s GST rate rationalisation and a robust first-quarter GDP growth of 7.8%, noted Vaqarjaved Khan, Senior Fundamental
VK Vijayakumar, Chief Investment Strategist at Geojit Financial Services, added that sustained heavy Domestic Institutional Investors (DII) buying has allowed FPIs to book profits

item.title: Food delivery likely to get costlier on platform fee hike, GST levy

review.headline_rewrite: Food delivery likely to get costlier on platform fee hike, GST levy
bullets: The hike in platform fees by Zomato, Swiggy and magicpin ahead of the festive season is set to make ordering food costlier for millions
Rival Zomato has raised its platform fee to ₹12.50 (excluding GST), whereas the third-largest food delivery player, magicpin, has also revised its platform fee
Estimates suggest that the additional burden on account of 18 per cent GST to be levied on delivery charges from September 22 is expected
E-mail queries sent to Swiggy and Zomato by PTI seeking responses remained unanswered.

item.title: Japan's Prime Minister Ishiba Shigeru to step down
